smells.name: ComplexMethod
smells.description: Prefer splitting up complex methods into smaller, easier to understand methods.

instances.message: The function onTouch appears to be too complex.
The function onTouch appears to be too complex.
The function notify_touched appears to be too complex.
The function move_to appears to be too complex.
The function notify_released appears to be too complex.

smells.name: LongMethod
smells.description: One method should have one responsibility. Long methods tend to handle many things at once. Prefer smaller methods to make them easier to understand.

instances.message: The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function onCreate is too long. The maximum length is 20.
The function recalculate_positions is too long. The maximum length is 20.

smells.name: NestedBlockDepth
smells.description: Excessive nesting leads to hidden complexity. Prefer extracting code to make it easier to understand.

instances.message: Function onTouch is nested too deeply.

smells.name: LargeClass
smells.description: One class should have one responsibility. Large classes tend to handle many things at once. Split up large classes into smaller classes that are easier to understand.

instances.message: Class CRC_View_Polygonal is too large. Consider splitting it into smaller pieces.

smells.name: MatchingDeclarationName
smells.description: If a source file contains only a single non-private top-level class or object, the file name should reflect the case-sensitive name plus the .kt extension.

instances.message: The file name 'CRC_Dreams.kt' does not match the name of the single top-level declaration 'CRC_Dream'.

smells.description: Cast operator throws an exception if the cast is not possible.

context cannot be safely cast to Activity.

smells.name: WildcardImport
smells.description: Wildcard imports should be replaced with imports using fully qualified class names. Wildcard imports can lead to naming conflicts. A library update can introduce naming clashes with your classes which results in compilation errors.

instances.message: android.graphics.Color.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.MotionEvent.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
kotlin.math.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.graphics.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
android.view.MotionEvent.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
kotlin.math.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.
java.lang.Math.* is a wildcard import. Replace it with fully qualified imports.

smells.name: ForbiddenComment
smells.description: Flags a forbidden comment. Defaults values are TODO:, FIXME: or STOPSHIP:

instances.message: This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.
This comment contains text that has been defined as forbidden in detekt.

smells.name: MagicNumber
smells.description: Report magic numbers. Magic number is a numeric literal that is not defined as a constant and hence it's unclear what the purpose of this number is. It's better to declare such numbers as constants and give them a proper name. By default, -1, 0, 1, and 2 are not considered to be magic numbers.

smells.name: MandatoryBracesIfStatements

smells.name: UnnecessaryParentheses
smells.description: Unnecessary parentheses don't add any value to the code and should be removed.

instances.message: Parentheses in (radius * 8.25f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 8.25f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 8.25f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 8.25f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.75f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.75f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.75f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.75f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.25f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.25f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.25f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.25f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.75f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.75f / 10f
Parentheses in (radius * 9.75f / 10f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: radius * 9.75f / 10f
Parentheses in (abs(touch_alpha - min_alpha) < pi/6f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: abs(touch_alpha - min_alpha) < pi/6f
Parentheses in (abs(touch_alpha - (min_alpha + 2*pi)) < pi/6f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: abs(touch_alpha - (min_alpha + 2*pi)) < pi/6f
Parentheses in (abs(touch_alpha - hour_alpha) < pi/6f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: abs(touch_alpha - hour_alpha) < pi/6f
Parentheses in (abs(touch_alpha - (hour_alpha + 2*pi)) < pi/6f) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: abs(touch_alpha - (hour_alpha + 2*pi)) < pi/6f
Parentheses in (start + num) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: start + num
Parentheses in ( digit_width / 2 ) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: digit_width / 2
Parentheses in (num_digits - numberOfDigits(a)) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: num_digits - numberOfDigits(a)
Parentheses in ( digit_height / 2) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: digit_height / 2
Parentheses in ((event.action == ACTION_MOVE) and moving) are unnecessary and can be replaced with: (event.action == ACTION_MOVE) and moving
